item.title: Creating a Puppet manifest and integrating it with Vagrant
item.description: This post will cover configuring Vagrant to automatically run a Puppet manifest on the vm created by “vagrant up.” This capability allows you to test your Puppet manifests, make changes and test again, all quickly and easily. Let’s get started: 1. Create the Puppet manifest & modules we will be using for our Vagrant tests.
